item.title: Develop and Deploy Laravel applications with Docker Compose
item.description: Learn how to efficiently set up Laravel development and production environments using Docker Compose.

item.title: Ruby on Rails language-specific guide
item.description: This guide explains how to containerize Ruby on Rails applications using Docker.

item.title: Vue.js language-specific guide
item.description: This guide explains how to containerize Vue.js applications using Docker.
